title: Low Mileage Cars Ltd.

title: Dethree Microbrewery
description: Ecommerce store for a fictional microbrewery featuring selected beers named after cources we took at BCIT. Admin part is HTML and PHP, Front-end is AngularJS. Still in progress, but will be out in few weeks.

title: Fare-saver Calculator

title: SunPump Solar Inc.
description: SunPump Solar Inc. is a Canadian Cleantech company. With a website re-design, the company aimed for satisfying needs both for new customers inquiring information and contractors looking for technical documentation.
